text: Marina Colasanti (26 September 1937 – 28 January 2025) was an Italian- Brazilian writer, translator and journalist. Colasanti was born in Asmara, Italy. She published many books, including works of poetry, collections of short stories and children's literature. Colasanti died in Rio de Janeiro, Brazil on 28 January 2015, at the age of 87. ==References== ==Other websites== * Entrevista ao jornalista André Azevedo da Fonseca Category:1937 births Category:2025 deaths Category:Italian journalists Category:Brazilian translators Category:Brazilian journalists Category:Translators
